author: NyandaKun
comment: Not necessarily to do with your laptop fault . Based on my experience in that issue , what I do is that I would check the WiFi on why is it unable to give me connection, is it because I need to re log in . If attempt to re log in and unable to receive connection, meaning I would restart the laptop just to reboot the system .
